text: The men's 800 metres at the 2018 European Athletics Championships took place at the Olympic Stadium on 9, 10, and 11 August.Timetable ==Records== {| class="wikitable" width=75% |- !colspan="5"|Standing records prior to the 2018 European Athletics Championships |- |World record | |1:40.91 |London, Great Britain |9 August 2012 |- |European record | |1:41.11 |Cologne, Germany |24 August 1997 |- |Championship record | |1:43.84 |Prague, Czechoslovakia |31 August 1978 |- |World Leading | |1:42.05 |London, Great Britain |22 July 2018 |- |European Leading | |1:43.65 |Monaco |20 July 2018 |} ==Schedule== {| class="wikitable" !
